div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 336px; height: 1px; padding-top: 47px; margin-left: 5px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: left;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: "Courier New"; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.div:
kind: CertificateRequest
metadata:
name: cert-1-ab0123
spec:
issuerRef: issuer-1
request: |
-----BEGIN CERTIFICATE REQUEST-----
...
-----END CERTIFICATE REQUEST-----

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 178px; height: 1px; padding-top: 15px; margin-left: 162px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: left;

display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 332px; height: 1px; padding-top: 657px; margin-left: 63px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: left;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: "Courier New"; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.div:
kind: CertificateRequest
metadata:
name: cert-1-ab0123
status:
conditions:
- type: Approved
status: "True"
reason: policy.cert-manager.io
- type: Ready
status: "True"
reason: Issued
certificate: | -----BEGIN CERTIFICATE-----
(leaf)
-----END CERTIFICATE-----
-----BEGIN CERTIFICATE-----
(intermediate)
-----END CERTIFICATE-----
